channel.title: NSBundle on Jepp Hu
channel.description: Recent content in NSBundle on Jepp Hu

item.title: NSBundle
item.description: 获取资源文件 NSString *bundlePath = [[NSBundle mainBundle] resourcePath]; NSString *imagePath = [[NSBundle mainBundle] pathForResource:@"imageName" ofType:@"png"]; 从文件中读取数据 NSString *path = [[NSBundle mainBundle] pathForResource:@"MKStoreKitConfigs" ofType:@"plist"]; NSDictionary *dic = [[[NSDictionary alloc] initWithContentsOfFile:path]];
